snippet: The stars of the Heat had some advice for the Nets, who are exhibiting growing pains with an overhauled roster built around two All-Stars, Deron Williams and Joe Johnson.
abstract: The stars of the Heat had some advice for the Nets, who are exhibiting growing pains with an overhauled roster built around two All-Stars, Deron Williams and Joe Johnson.

headline.main: In the Heat, Lessons for the Nets
